## Formulas

Formulas are rendered by KaTeX, https://github.com/Khan/KaTeX

It supports both inline: \(y = x / 2\) and displayed formulas:

\[ x_{1,2} = \frac{- b \pm \sqrt{b^2 - 4ac}}{2a} \]
